name: The Exiles Arrive!
description: The vile syndicalist menace has sadly taken over our home and haven. We shall arrive in the Indies and we shall liberate our homeland from this foreign occupation, for syndicalists are not Dutch at all!

name: The Only Man in the Dutch Government
description: If democracy had been a stable, helpful, defensive system then we wouldn't be in this situation. The queen should take full control over the direction of our nation, even if that means giving up some civil liberties.

name: Samen Uit, Samen Thuis
description: The Netherlands has a proud democratic tradition. Even in our darkest hour of occupation by tyrannical syndicalist thugs, we should not stray from this path as it would only put us on their level.

name: The Batavia Bargain
description: With the exiles alone, it seems highly unlikely that we will be capable of defeating the syndicalist menace. We should try to cut a deal with the locals, if only to avoid a revolt while we can't stop them.

name: Reestablish the CID
description: The CID has largely been forfeit in the chaos of the revolution, although many of its major officials are right here right now. We should refound the CID here. They shall help us defeat the syndicalist menace from the shadows.

name: Internal: The PID
description: The Politieke Inlichtingendienst is the internal security service of the Dutch East Indies. They should be held in high regard because they are our best defence against domestic syndicalist tendencies.

name: Expand the New Guinea Camps
description: The camps in New Guinea are ideal for keeping syndicalist thugs and other traitors away from the streets and more importantly, attacks. Located in New Guinea, no one will dare trying to escape through the rainforest with cannibalistic tribes hidden in the trees.

name: Root out the Partai Murba
description: Since the destruction of the ISDV, the proletarian party of Tan Malaka has been the foremost radically socialist independence movement. We should crack down on them lest they entice the Inlanders into trying to repeat the Batavian Revolution here.

name: Outlaw Syndicalism
description: Syndicalism is a disgusting system and should most definitely be outlawed to ensure our stability. It is bad enough that it has left its stain on the Dutch mainland.

name: Extend Decryption Techniques
description: We should improve on our decryption techniques to gain an advantage in intelligence against our enemies.

name: External: The BBO
description: The Bureau Buitengewone Opdrachten is the office overseeing resistance activities against the illegitimate Dutch government. They might just turn out to be the ones securing the liberation.

name: Activate Stay-Behind Network
description: Following the events of 1925 in Britain, the Dutch government realized that they might well be next to fall to the socialist menace. As such, a stay-behind network had been prepared, just in case. This has turned out to be a good choice as it will give our resistance network a huge start.

name: A Natural Resistance
description: Dutchmen are naturally resistant against oppression, and syndicalism is oppression by all means considering the limits they place on getting to be part of their government. By playing in to these feelings we can surely strengthen our internal forces.

name: Prepare the 'Bevrijding'
description: We should prepare the liberation of the Netherlands from the shadows to make it as swift as possible.

name: The Shadowforce
description: A force dawns upon [HOL.GetNameDef], a force of shadows. Peering from the dark we shall destabilize and destroy this menace!

name: The Army in Exile
description: We shall go on until the end. We shall fight in the Indies...

name: Ter Land
description: ...we shall fight in the fields and in the streets, we shall fight in the polders...

name: Ter Zee
description: ...we shall fight on the seas and oceans...

name: En in de Lucht
description: ...we shall fight with growing confidence and growing strength in the air...

name: Conscript Inlanders
description: Even with the exiles, Dutchmen are in short supply, we should start conscripting Inlanders otherwise we stand little chance to defeat the menace in Holland.

name: Establish the Bannelingenlegioen
description: Many enthousiastic exiles are here and want to help rescue our homeland from that scum of the earth. We should welcome such tendencies and establish a specific branch in the army for them.

name: Unite the Navy
description: We should get together the loyalist navies from back home and the navy that was in the Indies to begin with to allow for a joint offensive!

name: Bombers against the Reds
description: We should bomb every last red production facility to shreds, let's see how 'effective' syndicalism is without its factories.

name: Fighters against the Reds
description: Bombers need a proper amount of fighters to safeguard their missions. We should focus on those primarily to avoid making bombing runs a suicide mission.

name: Light Armor Divisions
description: We should invest in 'pantservoertuigen' - tanks - to take over our scouting duties, being much faster and better armored than plain infantry. This is the future of warfare.

name: Korps Mariniers in Exile
description: To establish a proper landing we need specialised forces who are trained in making such a landing. As per such, we should reestablish the korps mariniers; they will be the front of our offensive!

name: Naval Bombers
description: By using naval bombers we harass the enemy navies from the sky. It shall not be their navy that will prevent us from liberating the homeland.

name: Close Air Support
description: Support from the air has become instrumental in warfare of today. We should focus on this portion of aerial warfare to further our battlefield performance.

name: Ruling the Lands
description: The Landmacht (landforce) is ready to liberate the Netherlands. The syndicalists won't know what's coming for them!

name: Expanding our Navy
description: Our navy needs to be expanded if we want to secure our chances when we launch a naval invasion.

name: Ruling the Skies
description: The Luchtmacht (air force) is ready to liberate the Netherlands. The syndicalists won't know what's coming for them!

name: Focus on Cruisers
description: We should focus on the construction of new cruisers to expand our navy to open the way for an invasion of the mainland that will be the way to go.

name: Focus on Submarines
description: Submarines have always been our specialty, the first of them having been discovered by a Dutchman at that. Let us harass their shipping with them!

name: Ruling the Seas
description: The Marine (navy) is ready to liberate the Netherlands. The syndicalists won't know what's coming for them!

name: Ruling the Netherlands Soon!
description: All three branches of our army are ready. Let us launch an invasion with a ferocity that is never seen before!

name: Expertise of the Exiles
description: Many of those exiled are the most successful entrepeneurs of our society. They have a lot of expertise, both technical and in terms of how to organise a workforce.

name: Industrializing Java
description: Java is relatively urbanised and we need a basic industrial sector to work with. If we invest in building factories now, it will aid the liberation.

name: Build the Dockyards
description: We will need a secure navy if we ever hope to get a chance at liberting the homeland. Sadly however, most docks were based in the Netherlands. Luckily we have the expertise of the exiles to reconstruct them here.

name: Build Arms Factories
description: Weapons for our soldiers are needed for the libertion, we should work on the basis of the Artillerie-Constructie Winkel to build a potent arms industry right here in the east!

name: Ships for the Liberation
description: If we are to liberate the homeland, many ships will be needed. Let us get as much metal together as possible to build as many of them as possible.

name: Resources for the Liberation
description: We need resources if we are to liberate the homeland. These resources bring in money and money brings an army!

name: Guns for the Liberation
description: Guns are crucial for an army. We should gather as many guns as we can scrape together if we are to be taken seriously as a liberation force.

name: Conversion focus
description: We should focus on militarizing the factories instead of building them from scratch if we are to have the liberation happen within our lifetime.

name: Construction focus
description: We should focus on constructing new factories unless we want to avoid locking our economy in a military system that will hinder growth.

name: Expansion of Research and Development
description: Taking on a technological edge on the syndicalists using the technical know-how of our men should be relatively easy. The brightest minds of our nation are here, let us use their talents!

name: War Economy
description: It is time to ready our economy for war. Undoubtedly, the syndicalists will be doing the same but with their flawed system. We can do better!
